description:
REAR GARDEN

T2	Ash (Fraxinus excelsior)	30% Crown Reduction - Reducing the height and spread of the tree by approximately 2-3m to tidy and contain.
Final height = 10m and final spread = 5m.

T3	Lime (Tilia x europa)	30% Crown Reduction - Reducing the height and spread of the tree by approximately 2m to tidy and contain. Crown lift up to crown break.Final height = 6m and final spread = 3m.	

T4	Ash (Fraxinus excelsior)	30% Crown Reduction - Reducing the height and spread of the tree by approximately 2-3m to tidy and contain.
        Final height = 10m and final spread = 5m.

T5	Lime (Tilia x europa)	30% Crown Reduction - Reducing the height and spread of the tree by approximately 2m to tidy and contain. Crown lift up to crown break. Final height = 6m and final spread = 3m.
	
T6	Ash (Fraxinus excelsior)	30% Crown Reduction - Reducing the height and spread of the tree by approximately 2-3m to tidy and contain.
        Final height = 10m and final spread = 6m.

T7	Lawson Cypress (Chamaecyparis lawsoniana)	Reduce height only by approximately 2-3m. Final height = 6m and final spread = 3m.
